mapper.insert: insert into tb_Cart(food_id, food_name, food_price, cart_num, cart_total, shop_id, user_id, shop_name) values( #{food_id}, #{food_name}, #{food_price}, #{cart_num}, #{cart_total}, #{shop_id}, #{user_id}, #{shop_name} )
mapper.select: select * from tb_Cart where food_id=#{food_id} and shop_id=#{shop_id}
